item.title: Forward Equipment Cooling Overboard Exhaust Valve – Valve Inoperative Open

numlitem.para: Flight is conducted in an unpressurized configuration, and

For passenger, combi, STCs ST01529SE, ST01920LA, and ST03562AT freighters, procedures are established and used to ensure lower cargo compartments remain empty or are verified to contain only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), and/or Fly Away Kits.

note.para: UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.

numlitem.para: Single Pack operation is required for all phases of the flight.
With ACMs on board, en route altitude is limited to 10,000 ft.
After takeoff and with obstacle clearance assured, limit aircraft climb and descent rates to avoid ACM discomfort.

limitation.para: Maximum altitude limited to 15,000 ft. MSL.

numlitem.para: At cabin pressure altitude above 10,000 ft., up to and including 12,000 ft., oxygen must be provided for and used by each member of the flight crew on flight deck duty and must be provided for other crewmembers for that part of the flight at those altitudes that is of more than 30 minutes duration.

note.para: Required crew only if planned flight altitude exceeds 10,000 ft. MSL.

numlitem.para: At cabin pressure altitudes above 12,000 ft., oxygen must be provided for and used by each member of the flight crew on flight deck duty and must be provided for other crewmembers during entire flight at those altitudes.
A minimum of 2 hours of oxygen per crewmember on board.

table.title: CREW OXYGEN MINIMUM DISPATCH PRESSURE (2 HOUR RULE)

placard.para: Placard near Equip Cooling switch "OVBD EXH VLV INOP - OPEN" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: If the position of the (butterfly-type) airfoil disk, within the valve body, has not been visually confirmed to be fixed open or missing, the following procedure must be performed:
Place equipment cooling switch to the ALTN position.
Open forward cargo compartment left sidewall panel four feet aft of forward bulkhead. Ensure valve actuator position indicator is in the SMOKE position.
Disconnect and stow the electrical connector from the Forward Equipment Cooling Overboard Exhaust Valve.
Deselect the ALTN equipment cooling mode.
Press RECIRC FAN switch to ON.

sheet.title: FORWARD EQUIPMENT COOLING OVERBOARD EXHAUST VALVE
